name: Rakesh Nandakumar
title: Software Engineer
Technical Consultant
Full Stack Developer
Freelancer
Lecturer
shortBio: With over **3+ years** of hands-on experience in full-stack development, I bring more than just skills, I bring results. I've mastered the art of understanding client needs and architecting precise tech solution on the most in-demand, up-to-date industry best practices and technologies, ensuring scalability for the future. I’ve consistently delivered impactful solutions for government contracts and international clients.
longBio:
I am Rakesh Nandakumar, a software engineer with over 3 years of experience. I began as a freelancer, building web apps, mobile apps, IoT solutions, and cloud-based systems. Later, I joined WebRubix, a Canadian consulting company, where I worked remotely on international projects, expanding my expertise in .NET, React, Node.js, and cloud-first systems while delivering production-ready applications.

I then moved to Procons Infotech, developing enterprise-level solutions for government contracts. My work there involved Laravel, React, Vue, AWS, and React Native, often in high-performance, large-scale environments where security, scalability, and clean architecture were essential.

I don’t limit myself to a single stack—I choose the right tools for the problem. With a deep understanding of technology, I move easily between frameworks. What sets me apart is my ability to combine hands-on coding with big-picture thinking: aligning system design with business goals, long-term growth, and real-world impact. I can switch seamlessly between technical problem solving and architectural strategy, ensuring I deliver not just solutions, but the right solutions. Beyond tech, I excel at communication—translating ideas into scalable software, leading projects end-to-end, and driving initiatives with speed and precision. In short, I don’t just build software—I build trust, confidence, and systems people say are exactly what they needed.

education.institution: Asia Pacific Institute of Information Technology

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Building enterprise-level systems for government contracts, working on large-scale, mission-critical applications where security, scalability, and reliability are non-negotiable. Developed multi-vendor SaaS platforms, complex APIs, and web solutions using Laravel, React, Vue, and AWS. Designed and optimized back-end architectures, integrated cross-platform solutions, and contributed to government-grade systems that require clean architecture, performance tuning, and rigorous security standards.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Delivered international projects for Canadian clients in a full-time remote role. Designed and built applications using ASP.NET Core, React, Node.js, and cloud-first architectures. Worked on multi-vendor systems, implemented modern front-end features with React + Tailwind, and built secure REST APIs. Ensured seamless integration across stacks, collaborated with international teams, and consistently delivered polished, production-ready software tailored for global clients.

experience.title: Technical Consultant
experience.description: Started my career as a freelancer, where I delivered full-stack web and mobile applications, Chrome extensions, IoT and hardware-based solutions, and even machine learning projects. This role gave me direct client-facing experience, teaching me how to translate ideas into real solutions while managing end-to-end delivery—from requirement gathering and solution design to deployment and long-term support. Built a strong reputation for adaptability, problem-solving, and creating impactful solutions for both local and international clients.

techStack.name: Laravel
techStack.description: Strong expertise in building scalable backends and APIs with Laravel, using features like authentication, middleware, and Eloquent ORM.

techStack.name: Next.js
techStack.description: Expert in full-stack development with Next.js, leveraging SSR, static generation, and API routes for high-performance apps.

techStack.name: ASP.NET
techStack.description: Strong experience in developing secure, scalable enterprise apps with ASP.NET and integrating cloud-based services.

techStack.name: WordPress
techStack.description: Expert in WordPress development, including custom themes, plugins, WooCommerce, and performance optimization.

techStack.name: React Native
techStack.description: Expert in building cross-platform mobile apps with React Native, ensuring smooth performance on iOS and Android.

techStack.name: AWS
techStack.description: Extensive experience deploying and managing cloud solutions using AWS services like EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, and IAM.

techStack.name: JavaScript Frameworks
techStack.description: Strong proficiency in Vue.js, Alpine.js, and jQuery for building dynamic, responsive front-end components.

techStack.name: Raspberry Pi
techStack.description: Hands-on experience using Raspberry Pi for IoT, automation, and educational projects with hardware integration.

techStack.name: ChatGPT
techStack.description: Strong experience integrating ChatGPT for chatbots, AI-powered analytics, content generation, and support automation.
